roleset.name: hit
roleset.note: THUMP-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls bump-18.4-1, hit-18.1, spank-18.3 (from thump.01-v)

example.name: thump-v: tub thumping
example.text: In an ideological argument, [the participants]-1 tend [*-1]to thump the table.

roleset.name: emit regular dull sounds
roleset.note: THUMP-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls sound_emission-43.2. (from thump.02-v)

example.name: thump-v: intransitive
example.text: It was nothing, though his heart was thumping wildly.

example.name: thump-v: with path
example.text: At 7:25 [two hotel doormen]-2 came [*-2]thumping down the steps,carrying a saw-horse to be set up as a barricade in front of thehaberdashery store window next to the entranceway ...
example.arg: carrying a saw-horse to be set up as a barricade in front of the haberdashery store window next to the entranceway...
